title: 10 Essential Resume Tips for 2026
excerpt: Stay ahead of the competition with these 10 essential resume tips tailored for the 2026 job market.
content:
In 2026, the job market is more competitive than ever. To stand out, your resume needs to be more than just a list of your past jobs...

1. Focus on AI-Friendly Formatting

Many companies now use AI to screen resumes. Ensure yours is readable by both humans and machines...

2. Highlight Soft Skills

In the age of automation, soft skills like empathy, leadership, and complex problem-solving are highly valued...

seo.description: Discover the top 10 resume tips for 2026 to help you land your dream job in a competitive market.

title: How to Use AI to Build Your Resume
excerpt: Learn how to leverage AI tools to create a professional and effective resume in minutes.
content:
AI is transforming the way we work, and resume building is no exception. Tools like Reactive Resume use AI to help you craft compelling descriptions...

Step 1: Choose the Right Tool

Not all AI resume builders are created equal. Look for ones that offer privacy and customization...
